action.text: SA 3838 fell when when the motion to refer the House message to accompany S. 1301 with instructions to report back forthwith with the following amendment (SA 3837) tabled.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 3838 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3837 (the instructions of the motion to refer). (consideration: CR S6833; text: CR S6833) To modify the effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3838 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3837 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
